item.description: Some Academic History I went to Shanghai Foreign Language School until 2015. I then went to Cranbrook Schools at Bloomfield Hills, Michigan, where I found my initial academic interests: Cognitive Science. I therefore applied and began my college in Psychology. Still, CMU was renowned for its computer science program. After taking some introductory courses to programming (why not), I found greater pleasure in coding. I decided to switch to the School of Computer Science, and here I am.
